name: Rust-on-haiku
tagline: Everything about using the Rust programming language on Haiku
body:
## Welcome to Rust for Haiku
I have worked on a port of [Rust](http://rust-lang.org) to the [Haiku](http://www.haiku-os.org) operating system. Rust is a fast and safe programming language. And Haiku is an open source operating system that targets desktop computers.

## Notes about porting
This is the nerdy stuff, so if you just want to install the rust compiler, please skip this.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
